data.title: Updates: Israel approves Gaza ceasefire deal; Hamas touts US guarantee
data.text:
Updates: Israel approves Gaza ceasefire deal; Hamas touts US guarantee

These were the updates on Israel’s war on Gaza and attacks on the occupied West Bank for Thursday, October 9.
authors: Alastair Mccready Edna Mohamed Urooba Jamal Jillian Kestler-D'Amours
data.summary: Updates: Israel approves Gaza ceasefire deal; Hamas touts US guaranteeThese were the updates on Israel’s war on Gaza and attacks on the occupied West Bank for Thursday, October 9.
